name: uav-disaster-response-system
description: UAV Disaster Response System with ISAC Technology

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:simulation
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.deploy:render: npm run install:all && npm run build:production

author: Your Name
